Package com.andreasmenzel.adds_dji.OperationModes

The Operation Mode describes the "low-level" action the drone is currently performing. This can be compared to DJIs Flight Modes (e.g. "GPS", "AUTO_TAKEOFF", ...). The Operation Modes are higher level than the DJI Flight Modes, however.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelLanding
    This Operation Mode cancels the landing.
    CancelTakeOff
    This Operation Mode cancels the takeoff.
    Hovering
    This Operation Mode states that the drone is currently hovering and holding position.
    Landing
    This Operation Mode initiates a landing.
    None
    This Operation Mode is used if the current Operation Mode is not known.
    OnGround
    This Operation Mode states that the drone is currently on the ground.
    OperationMode
    The OperationMode describes the "low-level" action the drone is currently performing.
    StartVirtualStick
    This Operation Mode starts the DJI Virtual Stick mode.
    StopVirtualStick
    This Operation Mode stops the DJI Virtual Stick mode.
    TakeOff
    This Operation Mode starts the takeoff procedure.
    TurnOffMotors
    This Operation Mode turns off the motors of the drone.
    TurnOnMotors
    This Operation Mode turns off the motors of the drone.
    UseVirtualStick
    This Operation Mode uses the DJI Virtual Stick mode and sends virtual stick commands to the drone.
    WaypointMissionActive
    This Operation Mode indicates that a waypoint mission is currently active.
    WaypointMissionPause
    This Operation Mode pauses the currently uploaded waypoint mission.
    WaypointMissionReady
    This Operation Mode indicates that a waypoint mission was uploaded to the drone and can now be started.
    WaypointMissionResume
    This Operation Mode resumes the currently paused waypoint mission.
    WaypointMissionStart
    This Operation Mode starts the currently uploaded waypoint mission.
    WaypointMissionStop
    This Operation Mode stops the currently running waypoint mission.
    WaypointMissionUpload
    This Operation Mode uploads the generated waypoint mission to the drone.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OperationMode.States
    The possible states the Operation Mode can be in.
